title: Credit card travel benefits and coverage confirmations
dataVerified: Cardholder name, trip charged to card, coverage details, card issuer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Domain binding verifies card issuer. Credit card travel insurance coverage verification. Trip delay/baggage delay benefit claims. Rental car collision damage waiver documentation.
